name: Anime Girls Trample
description:
Anime Girls Trample is a game of your dream! Your deepest fantasies will come to life in this game. Haven't you dreamed of being crushed and trampled by a beautiful anime girl? Now you have a chance to try it! Just select a girl you like and come closer to her. If you are lucky and fast enough you won't be trampled instantly. Dodge girl's feet as long as you can to achieve higher score and unlock new girls!

Benefits:
  • Ten beautiful anime women for your pleasure
  • Immersive and lustful gameplay
  • Unleash your macrophilia and foot fetishes
  • Photomode to capture the most exciting moments
  • Cute Japanese voiceover for girls
  • Two various soundtracks. Select a calm ambient or 8 heavy metal songs
  • Global leaderboard and achievements

This is the game you've been waiting for all your life! So what are you waiting for?
